original_title: The Night We Dropped a Clanger
overview: The movie takes place during WWII.  A dashing British RAF Officer is earmarked for a secret mission behind enemy lines in occupied France, but wishing to distract the enemy, enlists a person to double for him and thereby draw attention to North Africa . An unlikely airman is found and tutored in the ways of an English officer.
title: The Night We Dropped a Clanger
